title: #151 - Tommy Johnagin & ME
description: Comedian Tommy Johnagin & I hang outside the Mancave, have a couple of cigars & talk about meeting on the road 11 years ago, his approach to writing, not having sex with our wives, & the absolutely brilliance of Ron Bennington.
